price: 2. Raac waxa laguu waxyoodo ee kaaga yimaada Rabbigaa; hubaal Alle waa u Xog Ogaal waxaad fashaan.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kāna bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
